languages.text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} immediately restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} until the end of the turn. The Warrior has no limit on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon attacks this turn.
Starting from the next round and until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, and their MP are reduced by −3.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Воин{/g} немедленно восстанавливает все {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} до конца своего хода. В этом ходу у воина нет ограничений на число атак {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}рукопашным{/g} оружием.
Со следующего раунда до конца боя воин не может совершать {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Рывок{/g}, а количество его ОП уменьшается на 3.

traits.locale_text: The Fighter immediately restores all AP and gains +(2 × Fighter's AGI bonus) movement points until the end of turn. This turn the Fighter has no limit on melee weapon attacks. Starting from the next round and until the end of combat, the Fighter can't use Charge, and their MP are reduced by −3.

The Fighter immediately restores all AP and gains +(2 × Fighter's AGI bonus) MP until the end of turn. The Fighter has no limit on melee weapon attacks this turn. Starting from the next round and until the end of combat, the Fighter can't use Charge, and their MP are reduced by −3.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} immediately restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} until the end of the turn. The Warrior has no limit on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon attacks this turn. Starting from the next round and until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use Charge, and their MP are reduced by −3.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} immediately restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} until the end of {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The Warrior has no limit on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon attacks this turn. Starting from the next {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} and until the end of combat, the Warrior can't use Charge, and their MP are reduced by −3.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} immediately restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} until the end of the turn. The Warrior has no limit on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon attacks this turn. Starting from the next round and until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use Charge, and their MP are reduced by −3.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}立刻恢复所有{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，并额外获得{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，效果持续至回合结束。战士本回合{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器没有攻击次数限制。
从下一轮开始直到战斗结束，战士无法再使用{g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}英勇冲锋{/g}，而且移动点数降低3点。
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} immediately restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} until the end of the turn. The Warrior has no limit on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon attacks this turn.
Starting from the next round and until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, and their MP are reduced by −3.

traits.locale_text: 战士立刻恢复所有{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，并获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，等同于（2×战士的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}），直到{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。战士本回合近战武器没有攻击次数限制。 从下一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}开始直到战斗结束，战士无法再使用英勇冲锋，而且{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}移动点数{/g}降低3点。

战士立刻恢复所有{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，并获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，等同于{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}，直到{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。战士本回合近战武器没有攻击次数限制。 从下一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}开始直到战斗结束，战士无法再使用英勇冲锋，而且移动点数降低3点。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}立刻恢复所有{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，并额外获得{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，效果持续至{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。战士本回合{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器没有攻击次数限制。 从下一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}开始直到战斗结束，战士无法再使用英勇冲锋，而且移动点数降低3点。

languages.text:
El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g} recupera inmediatamente todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y gana +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} hasta el final del turno. El guerrero no tiene límite de ataques con arma {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} este turno.
Empezando a partir del siguiente asalto y hasta el final del combate, el guerrero no puede usar {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Carga{/g} y sus PM se reducen en −3.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} immediately restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} until the end of the turn. The Warrior has no limit on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon attacks this turn.
Starting from the next round and until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, and their MP are reduced by −3.

traits.locale_text: El guerrero recupera inmediatamente todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y gana +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} del guerrero) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. El guerrero no tiene límite de ataques con arma cuerpo a cuerpo este turno. Empezando a partir del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} y hasta el final del combate, el guerrero no puede usar Carga y sus PM se reducen en -3.

El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g} recupera inmediatamente todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y gana +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} hasta el final del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. El guerrero no tiene límite de ataques con arma {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} este turno. Empezando a partir del siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} y hasta el final del combate, el guerrero no puede usar Carga y sus PM se reducen en −3.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が瞬時に全回復し、ターン終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}増加する。このターン中、ファイターは{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器による攻撃に制限がなくなる。 次ラウンドの開始時から戦闘終了まで、ファイターは突撃を使用できず、MPが−3減少する。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} immediately restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} until the end of the turn. The Warrior has no limit on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon attacks this turn. Starting from the next round and until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use Charge, and their MP are reduced by −3.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が瞬時に全回復し、ターン終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}増加する。このターン中、ファイターは{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器による攻撃に制限がなくなる。 次ラウンドの開始時から戦闘終了まで、ファイターは突撃を使用できず、MPが−3減少する。

ファイターの{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が瞬時に全回復し、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}増加する。このターン、ファイターは近接武器による攻撃に制限がない。 次{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の開始時から戦闘終了まで、ファイターは突撃を使用できず、MPが−3減少する。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が瞬時に全回復し、{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が+{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus}増加する。このターン、ファイターは{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器による攻撃に制限がない。 次{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の開始時から戦闘終了まで、ファイターは突撃を使用できず、MPが-3減少する。

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} immediately restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} until the end of the turn. The Warrior has no limit on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon attacks this turn.
Starting from the next round and until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, and their MP are reduced by −3.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Воин{/g} немедленно восстанавливает все {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} до конца своего хода. Со следующего раунда до конца боя воин не может совершать {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Рывок{/g}, а количество его ОП уменьшается на 3.

Боец немедленно восстанавливает все {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и получает +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g} бойца) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} до конца своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. В этом ходу у бойца нет ограничений на число атак рукопашным оружием. Со следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} до конца боя боец не сможет совершать Рывок, а количество его {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}ОП{/g} уменьшится на 3.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Воин{/g} немедленно восстанавливает все {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} до конца своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}. В этом ходу у воина нет ограничений на число атак рукопашным оружием. Со следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} до конца боя воин не может совершать Рывок, а количество его ОП уменьшается на 3.

languages.text:
Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g} erhält augenblicklich sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} zurück und erlangt +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}, und zwar bis zum Ende des Zugs. Der Krieger hat in diesem Zug kein Limit auf {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g}.
Ab Beginn der nächsten Runde und bis zum Ende des Kampfes kann der Krieger {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Ansturm{/g} nicht nutzen, und seine BP sind um −3 reduziert.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} immediately restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} until the end of the turn. The Warrior has no limit on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon attacks this turn.
Starting from the next round and until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, and their MP are reduced by −3.

traits.locale_text: Der Krieger erhält augenblicklich sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}BP{/g} zurück und erlangt +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Kriegers) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}, und zwar bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g}. Der Krieger hat in diesem Zug kein Limit auf Nahkampfangriffe. Ab Beginn der nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} und bis zum Ende des Kampfes kann der Krieger Ansturm nicht nutzen, und seine BP sind um −3 reduziert.

Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g} erhält augenblicklich sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} zurück und erlangt +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}, und zwar bis zum Ende des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g}. Der Krieger hat in diesem Zug kein Limit auf {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g}. Ab Beginn der nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} und bis zum Ende des Kampfes kann der Krieger Ansturm nicht nutzen, und seine BP sind um −3 reduziert.

languages.text:
Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrier{/g} récupère immédiatement tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et bénéficie de +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} jusqu'à la fin du tour. Aucune limite ne s'applique aux attaques à l'arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} du guerrier au cours de ce tour.
À partir du round suivant et jusqu'à la fin du combat, le guerrier ne peut pas utiliser {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g} et ses PD sont réduits de −3.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} immediately restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} until the end of the turn. The Warrior has no limit on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon attacks this turn.
Starting from the next round and until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, and their MP are reduced by −3.

traits.locale_text: Le Combattant récupère immédiatement tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et bénéficie de +(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} du Combattant) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Aucune limite ne s'applique aux attaques à l'arme de mêlée du Combattant au cours de ce tour. À partir du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} suivant et jusqu'à la fin du combat, le Combattant ne peut pas utiliser Charge et ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}PD{/g} sont réduits de -3.

Le Combattant récupère immédiatement tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et bénéficie de +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Aucune limite ne s'applique aux attaques à l'arme de mêlée du Combattant au cours de ce tour. À partir du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} suivant et jusqu'à la fin du combat, le Combattant ne peut pas utiliser Charge et ses PD sont réduits de −3.

Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Guerrier{/g} récupère immédiatement tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et bénéficie de +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} jusqu'à la fin du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Aucune limite ne s'applique aux attaques à l'arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} du Guerrier au cours de ce tour. À partir du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} suivant et jusqu'à la fin du combat, le Guerrier ne peut pas utiliser Charge et ses PD sont réduits de −3.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Savaşçı{/g}, anında tüm {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g}'sini tazeler ve +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazanır. Bu etki, turun sonuna dek sürer. Savaşçı'nın bu turda {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} silahı saldırı sınırı yoktur.
Savaşçı, bir sonraki raunttan başlayarak çatışma sonuna dek {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Hücum{/g} kabiliyetini kullanamaz ve HP'si 3 puan azalır.
languages.original_text:
The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} immediately restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} until the end of the turn. The Warrior has no limit on {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon attacks this turn.
Starting from the next round and until the end of combat, the Warrior cannot use {g|f:4955b43454f6488f82892e166c76c995}Charge{/g}, and their MP are reduced by −3.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Savaşçı{/g}, anında tüm {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP'sini{/g} tazeler ve +{unit_stat|WarhammerAgility|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazanır. Bu etki, turun sonuna dek sürer. Savaşçı'nın bu turda {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} silahı saldırı sınırı yoktur. Savaşçı, bir sonraki raunttan başlayarak çatışma sonuna dek Hücum kabiliyetini kullanamaz ve HP'si 3 puan azalır.
